Really fun and addictive. Should have picked this up years ago.

Very fun game to play with friends, would highly recommend it. The only problem is going to higher rankings (i.e. rank 1). The ranks are supposed to be fair a lot of the time but if I'm rank 8 I might be paired with a rank 16 killer. Which isn't fun, making the killer stop playing/uninstall. Same with survivors. It's a great game putting aside bugs, teammates, glitches, etc. i would recommend it but be careful with who you're paired with.

Piece of shit survivor main devs. Actively updating the game to make it easier for their boosted asses. Updating useless perks with useless changes like thanatophobia which ended up nerfing it instead of buffing it. Never changing meta perks because they are in their favor. They only play half the game so they have no idea what the fuck is going on except the one dev that even plays killer who plays Rank 17 hag with fucking insidious as his favorite perk. If things keep going down this road they are going to have to make a killer AI because there will be no killer players left. Struggles to run at even 50 fps on the best hardware out right now while also looking like a playstation 2 title. "Ruin is being used in upwards of 80% of usage in red ranks, so we nerf ruin." But yet they leave Decisive Strike alone when its used even more. Matchmaking is dogshit, the only reason you can even find a game nowadays is because they opened it up to cross play so you have console killers staring at a powerpoint presentation of you running away because the game runs even worse on console. You cannot even message these players after the match either. Even getting a 4K is hardly satisfying because of how annoying it is with all the changes they have made. There is not enough penalty for ragequitting which happens every other game. There are still several audio bugs that have been in the game for years.  Constant shitty maps being added, they keep adding killers you have to pay real money for. To quote the monkey devs "It is standard that 3 generators will be completed by the time the first survivor is hooked". They change killers because survivors find it frustrating to play against, even though there are some killers that are blatantly overpowered. Some killers are neglected since the start of the game. Name a single good change to pig since her release in January 2018! Trapper is the same basic dude just putting down traps since he came out. They make small "quality of life" changes like gutting billy. They make changes to "enhance the fun" of survivor players while treating the killer as a random entity not even a player. When they changed doctor they stated "We felt it was time to revisit his kit with an eye to making it less frustrating to play against him". Never once thinking about how it feels to play AS HIM. They don't see the killer as a player but instead a random goon running around the map to tease survivors. They never think about how it feels to play the role of killer. The killer is more stressed about pressuring survivors than the survivors are from the threat of the killer.  From the bottom of my heart I think they have done a pretty good job so far and I will take the advice of the game director Mathieu Cote, and "play survivor if you want to have fun or just go play Civ 5 its a good game just play that."

Игра просто пушка! Но как же без багов? есть в этой игре места, в уголках карты обычно, где ты хочешь пройти через дерево а там текстура... А ман чё? А ман по хребту как даст, что забудешь как себя зовут от такого поворота)) А так игра очень крута, ещё момент есть что катки за сурвов ищутся днём быстрее в 5-10 раз чем ночью. А с маньяками всё как раз таки наоборот, ночью быстрее чем днём! И так всегда. я уверен что это так система делает( Но зачем??

very fun

La verdad este juego es lo mas estresante del mundo, y no lo digo porque cause miedo, sino que te hace enojar por el nivel de toxicidad que tiene la comunidad, y los desarrolladores no hacen nada, es mas ayudan a que sea mas toxico el juego, con sus ultimas actualizaciones lo unico que experimente fueron partidas que duraron no mas de 2 minutos porque me mataban al instante o se quedaban al lado del gancho custodiando que tenga una estadia comoda, pero si resultaba que me escapaba o me descolgaban, ellos tenian la gentileza de volverme a tumbar para depositarme nuevamente en nuestro amigo el gancho, muchas gracias por ayudar a mi perdida de cabello y a la sordera de mis vecinos ya que de la frustracion gritaba mas que una hinchada de futbol al meter un gol.
Ah bueeeeno, magnifica actualizacion, porque simplemente no sacan la linterna del juego? quien es el que toma las decisiones de desarollo? porque esta haciendo un laburo de mierda

JUEGO RECOMENDADO
Jugador desde 2019, Main Killer que suele jugar Survivor cada tanto.
Desde que comencé a jugar hasta la actualidad muchos problemas de balance fueron solucionados. El nerfeo a Golpe Decisivo y a Maleficio:Ruina fueron los cambios más notorios para el juego, y ambos fueron cambios correctos y positivos.

Además, los últimos DLC'S fueron estupendas introducciones al juego (salvo el de los coreanos fanáticos del KPOP, horrible).  

Dicho de manera más breve: Recomiendo comprar el juego si realmente te interesa su temática, ya que Dead by Daylight va en un sendero positivo (y esperemos que siga así).
